string-array.name: course_MAD
string-array.item: Class and Objects, Inheritance, Polymorphism, Abstract class, Encapsulation, Array, Basic of Java Programming
Introduction to Android platform, Application framework, Content Provider, Intents, Android API level
UI design, Activities, Views, Layout, Activity Lifecycle, Menus, Notification, Communication between activities

string-array.name: practical_MAD
string-array.item: Create Simple Tic Tac Toe Game in android and run it on real Device.
Create Simple Calculator in android and run it on real Device.
Design a Tab Layout for android device and show course information.

string-array.name: course_CLOUD
string-array.item: Roots of Cloud Computing, Layers and types of cloud, Desired features of Cloud, Cloud Infrastructure Management
Unit 2: Introduction to virtualization and Cloud Deployment Models
Basics of Virtualization – Types of Virtualization Techniques – Merits and demerits of Virtualization –Full Vs Para-virtualization
Introduction, Background, issues for enterprise applications on the cloud, Transition challenges, Enterprise cloud technology

string-array.name: practical_CLOUD
string-array.item: Creating a Virtual Machine (VM) on a Guest Operating System.
Running Multiple Concurrent operating system using a bare Metal Hypervisor.
Creating a Virtual Network to allow VM to VM communication.

string-array.name: course_CI
string-array.item: Fuzzy Set Theory: Fuzzy set: Membership, Operations, Properties; Fuzzy Relations. Fuzzy Logic,Fuzzification, Fuzzy Inference, Fuzzy Rule Based System, Defuzzification, Application.
Biological neurons and its working. Simulation of biological neurons to problem soloving.Different ANNs architectures.Trainging techniques for ANNs
Background, Back-Propagation Learning, Back-Propagation Algorithm, Applications.

string-array.name: practical_CI
string-array.item: Complete the online matlab Certification By given Link.
Equality,inclusion,comparability,union,intersection,complement of both sets,set difference{(a-b) and (b-a)},symmetric difference.
Select any real time Application and prepare a fuzzy controller using fuzzy tool box.
